Articles.Content:
The water is weird. Actually, it acts more like real life water, which is disorienting after having lived in KSP1 for so long. Stuff actually sinks!

I tried recreating a small hydrofoil I had in KSP1. I then launched it at the docks. It stood on its tail and started acting like a porpoise feeding.  On another attempt it started going slowly out to sea as though there was a current in the water. 

 

Despite the dock, boats are not an option at the moment.

 

I also tried doing a water landing in a plane. It sank.

Edited February 25, 2023 by Klapaucius
